input_args.passage: 'Great Heathen Army | The name Great Heathen Army is derived from the Anglo-Saxon Chronicle. The force was led by three of the five sons of the semi-legendary Ragnar Lodbrok, ...'
input_args.claim: 'Therefore, it is reasonable to deduce that the West Saxon forces were the military forces of Wessex, which would have included the people of Wessex, potentially under the leadership of figures like Cerdic and Cynric.'
